lemma LLL_short_polynomial: assumes deg_u_0: "degree u \<noteq> 0" and deg_le: "degree u \<le> n" and pl1: "pl > 1" and monic: "monic u" shows "degree (LLL_short_polynomial pl n u) < n" and "LLL_short_polynomial pl n u \<noteq> 0" and "poly_mod.dvdm pl u (LLL_short_polynomial pl n u)" and "degree u < n \<Longrightarrow> f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow> poly_mod.dvdm pl u f \<Longrightarrow> degree f < n \<Longrightarrow> \<parallel>LLL_short_polynomial pl n u\<parallel>\<^sup>2 \<le> 2 ^ (n - 1) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2"
